remarks: An ortholattice is distributive in one ordering direction (join version).  (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ledi.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
ledi.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
ledi.3 $e |- C e. CH $.
lejdiri $p |- ( ( A i^i B ) vH C ) C_ ( ( A vH C ) i^i ( B vH C ) ) $.
